statements: DELETE FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' AND design_sketches IS NULL;
DELETE FROM FashionDesignersDesigns WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM FashionDesignersDesigns WHERE id = 1 AND designer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM DesignersNotes WHERE designer_id = 2 AND note_title = 'Final Collection Notes';
DELETE FROM DesignSketches WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM inspiration_images WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' AND image_title = 'Summer Collection';
DELETE FROM designer_sketches WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' AND sketch_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fabric_swatches WHERE swatch_color = 'Blue' AND swatch_material = 'Silk';
